testPlan.title: Public Routes Test Plan - Gestao Consert
testPlan.description: Test plan for all public routes accessible without authentication. Focus on testing routes that do not require login: /, /login, /cadastro, /sobre, /termos, /politicas-privacidade, /planos, /os, /os/buscar, /pagamentos/*, /instrucoes-verificacao
steps: Navigate to / and verify landing page loads successfully
Verify navigation menu is visible and functional on landing page
Verify CTA buttons are clickable on landing page
Verify links to other pages work on landing page
Navigate to /login and verify login page loads successfully
Verify login form is visible with email and password fields
Verify submit button is clickable on login page
Verify validation works on login form (empty fields)
Verify link to registration page works from login
Navigate to /cadastro and verify registration page loads successfully
Verify registration form is visible with all required fields
Verify validation works on registration form
Verify submit button is clickable on registration page
Navigate to /sobre and verify about page loads successfully
Verify content is displayed on about page
Navigate to /termos and verify terms page loads successfully
Verify terms content is displayed
Navigate to /politicas-privacidade and verify privacy policy page loads successfully
Verify privacy policy content is displayed
Navigate to /planos and verify plans page loads successfully
Verify pricing plans are displayed on plans page
Verify subscribe buttons are clickable on plans page
Navigate to /os and verify OS public page loads successfully
Verify OS search options are visible on OS page
Navigate to /os/buscar and verify OS search page loads successfully
Verify search form is visible on OS search page
Verify search input works on OS search page
Navigate to /pagamentos/sucesso and verify payment success page loads successfully
Verify success message is displayed on payment success page
Navigate to /pagamentos/falha and verify payment failure page loads successfully
Verify error message is displayed on payment failure page
Navigate to /pagamentos/pendente and verify payment pending page loads successfully
Verify pending status message is displayed on payment pending page
Navigate to /instrucoes-verificacao and verify verification instructions page loads successfully
Verify instructions are displayed on verification instructions page
Verify all pages are accessible without authentication
Verify no redirects to login page occur for public routes
Verify responsive design works on mobile devices for all public pages
